name: Bora Bora
description: An island in French Polynesia known for its clear waters and overwater bungalows

name: Santorini
description: An island in Greece known for its white-washed buildings and blue domed churches

name: Marrakech
description: A city in Morocco known for its vibrant markets and traditional architecture

name: Banff
description: A town in the Canadian Rockies known for its stunning natural beauty and outdoor activities

description: An island in Thailand known for its beaches and nightlife

name: Hawaii
description: A group of islands in the Pacific Ocean known for their natural beauty and tropical climate
